snippet.title: MOTHERED - A ROLE-PLAYING HORROR GAME - Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON [STEAM]
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1830720/MOTHERED__A_ROLEPLAYING_HORROR_GAME/
Coming to Steam 24th of December, 2021

MOTHERED is a first-person horror adventure game with point-and-click mechanics, set in a familiar yet eerily unnatural depiction of home. Set over the course of seven days, you play the role of LIANA - a young girl who's arrived home to stay with her mother after having undergone major surgery.

FOLLOW ME ON [TWITTER]: https://twitter.com/ENIGMA_STUDIO_
SUPPORT ME ON [PATREON]: https://www.patreon.com/ENIGMA_STUDIO
